title: Attempting to reconnect
body: I have reset my entire connection, I have called my ISP's automated service and they have refreshed the signal to my router. Yet I am still getting attempting to reconnect and a long period of no movement from my champion. When I ran a ping to 104.160.131.3 I experienced a period where my ping was fine then all of a sudden "request timed out..." every so often. So I'm thinking there must be packet loss or a bad hop or what have you. How would I go about resolving such a problem? Should I try a reinstall just in case? I noticed it after this most recent patch. I am on a wired connection. My ISP is Charter Communications.

replies.body:
It does sound like your network is having trouble staying connected to the game server, and it could be for a variety of reasons.  It could be packet loss, but that would usually result in input delay and not necessarily a full disconnect.  You can run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for your matches to get an overview to know for sure.  My suggestion would be to go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for a series of steps to strengthen your connection and settings.

You can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as a utility to automatically make adjustments like configuring your firewall.  Hopefully, these resources will fix you right up!
